column5: In the heart of the metroplex centrally located between Fort Worth and Dallas.   Within walking distance to River Legacy Park and 2.5 miles from AT&T Stadium, Globe Life Park, Six Flags Over Texas and Hurricane Harbor. In addition, you can find shopping, restaurants and entertainment at nearby Lincoln Square.  Quiet neighborhood in a very established part of North Arlington.  Fast WiFi. Easy parking out front.
column8: 2.5 Miles from attractions. Full Bed. Private Room
